 Fits most Hair Dryers Tourmaline Infused Two Styling Surfaces: Flat and Volume Fingers

title: Remington CI95AC/2 Tstudio Salon Collection Pearl Digital Ceramic Curling Wand, 1/2 Inch - 1 Inch
Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick Airy Fairy
description: Long lasting Lipstick locks colour to lips for up to 8 hours wear. 50% more colour. Soft, smooth, comfortable formula.

title: DevaCurl Mist-er Right Lavender Curl Revitalizer 12.0 oz
description: Buy DevaConcepts Hair Styling Products - DevaCurl Mist-er Right Lavender Curl Revitalizer 12.0 oz. How-to-Use: Spray 10 inches from hair to evenly mist the curls. Scrunch toward the scalp in upward motion. Reawakens and reactivates any Deva styler previously applied to the curls

title: DevaCare One Condition, No-Fade Ultra Creamy Conditioner 32 fl oz
description: DevaCare's ultra creamy, daily conditioner keeps curls shiny and manageable. Enriched with vitamin C and orange peel extract to slow color fading. Whether your hair is curly, wavy, or chemically processed. Made in the USA.

title: III Sisters Of Nature Curling Gelo, 8 Ounce
description: The curling gelo helps enhance your natural curl pattern while providing you with a frizz free, non greasy, non drying look for superior long curls, waves and twists. Superior moisturizer. Elongates curls. Enhances waves.

title: CHI Silk Infusion, 12 Fluid Ounce
description: CHI Infra is the first hair care line of its kind utilizing CHI 44 Ceramic and Cationic Hydration Interlink. It provides moisture and strength by interlocking it into the inner structure of the hair.

title: c. Booth Body Butter, Honey Almond, 8 oz
description: New original Booth Honey & Almond Body Butter 8 oz (227 g). Ingredients Water (aqua), Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Stearic Acid, Isopropyl Palmitate, Emulsifying Wax, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG 100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Capric/Caprylic Stearic Triglyceride, Beeswax (Apis Mellifera), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter (Cocoa), Aloe Vera (Aloe Barbadensis) Leaf Juice, Allantoin (Comfrey Root) , Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) (Shea Butter), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Triticum Vulgare (Wheat Germ) Oil (Wheat), Vitis Vinifera,(Grape) Seed Oil (Grape), Hydroxypropyltrimonium Honey, Fragrance, Triethanolamine, Tetrasodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, 2 Bromo 2 Nitropropane 1, 3 Diol Directions After a shower or bath scoop a dollop of body butter into your hands and massage all over your body. Repeat as necessary. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Product Description Product Description Simple. Natural. Trusted. Our Honey and Almond Body Butter pays homage to rough, dry skin. Extra rich and extra thick, this buttery body cream will smooth away unbecoming flaky skin. Sweet Almond Oil anoints your skin, while leaving it jumping for joy. Not tested on animals. Made in Canada

title: c. Booth 4-in-1 Multi Action Body Lotion, Lemon Sugar, 32 oz
description: Why should faces get all the special treatments? c. Booth believes in equal rights for skin below the chin. Take a close look at yours and see if it doesn't deserve the four fabulous benefits of this extremely busy lotion: 1) A potent combo of alpha hydroxyl acids works tirelessly to ditch dead skin cells and even out skin tones so even sun-damaged areas look healthy and happy. 2) Sweet almond, apricot kernel and shea butter oils work in perfect harmony to hydrate needy skin. 3) Vitamins and minerals perform like superheroes, valiantly fighting off the dastardly deed of the harsh environmental forces that threaten our skin. 4) Caffeine firms and tones less-than-taut skin, making it feel youthful, revitalized and wide awake.
